current.title: Starting with the right intentions
current.html:
Bismillah! (بِسْمِ اللَّهِ)

We're excited to launch this new website with you all to serve as a digital home for our thoughts, events and announcements.

May Allah make this website a trust (أَمانَة) for future members of the Warwick Islamic Society insha'Allah (إِنْ شَاءَ الله).

For now, all our content is still connected to on the linktree:

Catch you all soon!
current.plaintext:
Bismillah! (بِسْمِ اللَّهِ)

We're excited to launch this new website with you all to serve as a digital home for our thoughts, events and announcements.

May Allah make this website a trust (أَمانَة) for future members of the Warwick Islamic Society insha'Allah (إِنْ شَاءَ الله).

For now, all our content is still connected to on the linktree:

Warwick ISocwarwick.page.isoc.link

Catch you all soon!

current.excerpt:
Bismillah! (بِسْمِ اللَّهِ)

We're excited to launch this new website with you all to serve as a digital home for our thoughts, events and announcements.

May Allah make this website a trust (أَمانَة) for future members of the Warwick Islamic Society insha'Allah (إِنْ شَاءَ الله).

For now, all our content is still connected to on the linktree:

Warwick ISocwarwick.page.isoc.link

Catch you all soon!
